data.content: Generate the content of the top-level.yaml file for a pizzeria chatbot. This should be a menu-type module called top-level, acting as the main entry point. Include a presentation field with a welcome message and function description. In items, create: a greeting answer, a pizza_qa module, and an order_flow module for orders. Also, add a fallback message if the user is not understood. Return only the YAML code.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to our pizzeria chatbot! I'm here to assist you with your pizza orders and answer any questions you may have about our menu. Let's make your pizza experience delightful!
  fallback: I'm sorry, I did not understand that. Could you please rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Greeting
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Hello! Welcome to our pizzeria. How can I assist you today?
  - title: Pizza Q&A
    kind: module
    reference: pizza_qa
  - title: Order Flow
    kind: module
    reference: order_flow
```
